name: Rainbow Road - Make Money Free
description:
Rainbow Road is an awesome app with no in-app purchases.  It is free for everyone to enjoy!
 
All you need to do is play any of our games and collect at least one ticket to be entered.  The more tickets you collect the more fun you are going to have.  Check back every couple days to see if your name is on the special ticket!  
 
It's very simple, every couple days we are sharing back a portion of our advertising revenue with one lucky player.  The larger our user base grows the more we will give back. There are no in app purchases.  We are calling our model Free-2-Fun and we are very proud of it, so download Rainbow Road and check it out!  Why would you play anything else?
 
So what are you waiting for? Download Rainbow Road today to unlock more awesome games, and try to be the best!  Using Rainbow Road, anyone can have fun by simply by playing games at home, in the bus station, on the metro, or in the subway etc. ANYWHERE! 
 
Have questions, problems, or feedback? Reach out to us at support@winrgames.com
